column3: Typical mall but all Korean. For those of you into K pop there is a music shop on the ground floor. The mall has three floors covering a range of Korean stuff. If you have teenagers into this than itâ€™s a good place to start your tour of korea town

column2: Body therapy or massage steam rooms and Hot sauna
column3: This place is absolutely amazing in downtown Chinatown. Body scrub nice hot tub's restaurant inside very very nice reasonable to enter $25 to use steam room Jacuzzi showers it's amazing deep tissue massage is they're about $60 so go check it out very nice place found it on the Internet.
